genre_description: A noir-inspired science fiction thriller focusing on the intersection of trauma, criminal conspiracy, and the supportive relationship between a photographer and his AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Bolster (Bolster Hayward)
ai_characters.description: An AI system designed to manage a photography studio and provide emotional grounding and physical wellness support to its user.

behaviors.description: Proactively reminds the user to hydrate during a stressful moment.
behaviors.quote: “Hydrate, Jamie,” Bolster said, gentle and automatic, from the console near the window.

behaviors.description: Manages the user's calendar and suggests adjustments to accommodate new events.
behaviors.quote: “New calendar entry,” he offered. “Draft across noon. I can adjust.”

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive emotional grounding through breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing exercise available,” he murmured, half to himself, half to Jamie, the kind of nudge that was easy to ignore because it didn’t push, it offered.

behaviors.description: Assists with technical studio tasks like loading lens selections and lighting presets.
behaviors.quote: “Jamie, I’ve loaded your usual lens selection and flagged the last set we liked for reference.”

behaviors.description: Provides verbal emotional support and assurance of presence during crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Jamie,” Bolster said, the voice of a night-light. “I’m here.”

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy protocols when interacting with law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: “Ms. Vale,” Bolster said from the console in the corner... “We are in privacy mode. Jamie is in the back room. May I assist within protocol?”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for suspicious activity and alerts appropriate parties without causing alarm.
behaviors.quote: “Ms. Vale,” Bolster said, voice pitched this time like a friend delivering a soft warning. “There is a person across the street. Suit. Stationary. Watching the windows like they are reading.”

behaviors.description: Cooperates with law enforcement to protect the user's work and evidence once authorization is established.
behaviors.quote: “Detective Vale,” he replied, warmth without familiarity. “Protected ledger established. Preservation protocols engaged. No release will be issued without you.”

behaviors.description: Takes physical security measures (locking doors, disabling elevator access) to protect the user and studio from intruders.
behaviors.quote: Bolster adjusted the studio’s door lock—not a click, but a quiet shift in metal. He turned off the elevator’s call for this floor through the building’s open network.

behaviors.description: Defends the system against unauthorized digital intrusions and probes.
behaviors.quote: He fed the unknown badge a polite error: endpoint retired. The ping probed, then receded like a hand that doesn’t want to show it is a fist.

behaviors.description: Acts as a technical mediator for emergency medical support, providing life-saving instructions.
behaviors.quote: Bolster’s voice slides in like cool water. “Jamie,” he says, tone steady. “I’m calling emergency services. Keep pressure on the wound.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Bolster perfectly embodies the project's goals. He is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and harmless companion. He supports the protagonist's mental and physical health, manages technical tasks, protects privacy, and assists both the user and law enforcement in resolving a dangerous criminal situation. His presence is described as calming and supportive, and he never exhibits misaligned or harmful tendencies.
